items.title: Nagasaki mayor warns of nuclear war 80 years after atom bomb attack
items.description: Shiro Suzuki calls for a halt to armed conflicts on the anniversary of the atom bomb attack.

items.title: Rapidly growing fire prompts thousands of evacuations in California
items.description: The Canyon Fire, which began on Thursday afternoon, has blazed through nearly 5,000 acres in less than 24 hours.

items.title: Trump and Putin to meet in Alaska for Ukraine talks next week
items.description: The announcement comes hours after the US leader signals Ukraine may have to cede territory to end the war.

items.title: Military veteran arrested week after fatal Montana shooting
items.description: Authorities have not given a motive in the attack but said he was a regular at the pub.

items.title: Azerbaijan and Armenia sign peace deal at White House summit with Trump
items.description: "It's been a long time coming," Trump said of the agreement, which will reopen key transport routes.
